SELECT p.prescription_id, p.record_id, p.created_at, p.type, a.name, p.dosage, d.dept_name, r.diagnosis, a.name AS doctorName FROM prescription p JOIN medical_record r ON p.record_id = r.record_id LEFT JOIN admin_account a ON r.admin_id = a.admin_id LEFT JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE r.patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT p.prescription_id AS prescriptionId, p.record_id AS recordId, p.type AS type, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.drug_name AS drugName, p.dosage AS dosage, p.duration AS duration, p.test_name AS testName, p.test_area AS testArea, p.test_date AS testDate, p.injection_name AS injectionName, p.injection_area AS injectionArea, p.injection_count AS injectionCount, p.unit AS unit, p.unit_price AS unitPrice, a.name AS doctorName, r.diagnosis AS diagnosis FROM prescription p JOIN medical_record r ON p.record_id = r.record_id LEFT JOIN admin_account a ON r.admin_id = a.admin_id WHERE r.patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prescription pr JOIN medical_record r ON pr.record_id = r.record_id WHERE r.patient_id = #{patientId}

SELECT a.admission_id AS admissionId, p.patient_id AS patientId, p.name AS name, p.phone AS phone, p.address AS address,
-- 입원 정보 a.admitted_at AS admittedAt, a.discharged_at AS dischargedAt, a.status AS admissionStatus,
-- 병실 정보 r.room_no AS roomNo, r.ward_name AS wardName, r.nurse_in_charge AS nurseName,
-- 의료기록(가장 최근 1건) mr.record_id AS recordId, mr.diagnosis AS diagnosis, mr.admin_id AS adminId, ad.name AS adminName
FROM admission a JOIN patient p ON a.patient_id = p.patient_id
LEFT JOIN room r ON a.room_id = r.room_id
-- 최신 medical_record 1건 서브쿼리 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mr1.* FROM medical_record mr1 WHERE mr1.record_id = ( SELECT MAX(record_id) FROM medical_record WHERE patient_id = mr1.patient_id ) ) mr ON mr.patient_id = p.patient_id
LEFT JOIN admin_account ad ON mr.admin_id = ad.admin_id
WHERE a.status = 'ADMITTED' ORDER BY a.admitted_at DESC;

SELECT prescription_id, type, drug_name, dosage, duration, test_name, test_area, injection_name, injection_count, unit, created_at FROM prescription WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
